author: Niko Vorobyov
title: ‘Russia is against war’: Thousands rally in rare show of dissent
description: Hours after Putin ordered his troops into Ukraine, Russians across the country took to the streets to slam his actions.
content:
Note: All of the protesters interviewed for this article refused to give their names out of fear for their safety.
St Petersburg, Russia No to war! chanted the crowd of mostly young Russians gathere… [+5084 chars]
